summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1321, for the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue, from East Cherry Street to East Terrace Street; and East Terrace Street, from Twentieth Avenue to Twenty-third Avenue, by grading and curbing the same, and constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 14967 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
